WRITING.TEXT: It still looks too artificial especially with the ICS enabled and the 'blocky' feel. Also did you implemented the culture mechanics for border expansion? It really adds immersion to the game.

WRITING.TITLE: Will Cinnamon share the fate of Unity?
WRITING.TEXT: It's also a GNOME 3 fork and its being developed by small team.

No need to apologize. Probably not every icon is changed by this Icon theme. Here is how the Nautilus looks with this icon set.

B..but it looks nice :) Also the theme and icons are Arc and AFAIK it's not in stock GNOME.
